name: Bomb Corridor
description:
Use mouse to move ship left and right. Avoid hitting block walls and bombs. Game is randomly generated.

Left click to shoot.  Pick up Life, Fuel, and Ammo blocks.

Fuel depletes over time.

Can you make it to the end?

This was my first time being the coder on a game jam and my first solo jam.

Most assets are from Scratch or hastily made by me with the exception of these sounds:
Laser gun: https://freesound.org/people/cabled_mess/sounds/352701/
Bomb explosion: https://freesound.org/people/MATRIXXX_/sounds/522572/
